vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἄβελ, (WH, Ἅ-), ὁ, indecl.
(הֶבֶל),
Abel (Gen.4:2-10): Heb.11:4, 12:24; αἵμα Ἄ., Mat.23:35, Luk.11:51.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.4.2;
son of: Adam (H0121) and Eve (H2332);
brother of: Cain (H7014B) and Seth (H8352)
§ Abel, "morning mist"
Abel, (Proper name), indecl, Mt. 23:35; Lk. 11:51; Heb. 11:4; 12:24
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞伯 这个專有陽性名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "虛空 無常)"
亞當的第二個兒子,被他的兄弟該隱所殺
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚伯 这个专有阳性名词在希伯来文的意思是 "虚空 无常)"
亚当的第二个儿子,被他的兄弟该隐所杀
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: A-bên, theo tiếng Hê-bơ-rơ là Hebel, nghĩa là « hơi nước » hay « ngắn ngủi ». A-bên là con trai thứ hai của A-đam. // H1893 Stk 4:2,4,8,9,25
